      • handleGamePlayerCommand

        public void handleGamePlayerCommand(String[] args)
        handle gameplayer command
        Parameters:
        args - [0] -add/-remove
        args - [1] player name

      • isNumberOfPlayerValid

        public boolean isNumberOfPlayerValid()

      • populateCountries

        public void populateCountries()
        random assign countries to players equally

      • initPlayersUnplacedArmies

        public void initPlayersUnplacedArmies()
        allocate a number of initial armies to each players, depending on number of players, from the game rule If 2 are playing, each player counts out 40 Infantry. If 3 are playing, each player counts out 35 Infantry. If 4 are playing, each player counts out 30 Infantry. If 5 are playing, each player counts out 25 Infantry. If 6 are playing, each player counts out 20 Infantry.

      • handlePlaceArmyCommand

        public void handlePlaceArmyCommand(String countryName)
        Handle place army command for current player. The player is selected in a round-robin rule
        Parameters:
        countryName - name of the country to place army. The country must belong to current player

      • handlePlaceAllCommand

        public void handlePlaceAllCommand()
        automatically randomly place all remaining unplaced armies for all players

      • getCurrentPlayer

        public Player getCurrentPlayer()
        This get the current player without print the message
        Returns:
        current player

      • startRoundRobinPlayers

        public Player startRoundRobinPlayers()
        start round-robin for list of players, exclude lost players
        Returns:
        the player in turn

      • turnToNextPlayer

        public void turnToNextPlayer()
        gives turn to the next player in list

      • showCurrentPlayer

        public void showCurrentPlayer()
        print the current player to console

      • enterReinforcement

        public boolean enterReinforcement()
        REINFORCEMENT PHASE enter reinforcement phase
        Returns:
        true if enter reinforcement phase successfully or the current player is already in reinforcement phase

      • handleReinforceCommand

        public void handleReinforceCommand(String[] args)
        REINFORCEMENT PHASE handle reinforce command
        Parameters:
        args - [0] country name
        args - [1] number of armies to reinforce

      • enterFortifyPhase

        public boolean enterFortifyPhase()
        FORTIFICATION PHASE enter fortification phase
        Returns:
        true if enter fortification phase successfully or the current player is already in fortification phase

      • handleMultipleFortificationCommand

        public void handleMultipleFortificationCommand(String[] args)
        move any number of armies from one country to another if they are connected If last argument is "none" or "-none" then user choose not to do a move. The arguments can be divided by a set of 3 as below. User can enter multiple set of arguments.
        Parameters:
        args[0] - from country
        args[1] - to country
        args[2] - number of armies

      • enterAttackPhase

        public boolean enterAttackPhase()
        ATTACK PHASE enter attack phase
        Returns:
        true if enter attack phase successfully or the current player is already in attack phase

      • handleAttackCommand

        public void handleAttackCommand(String[] args)
        it handles the attack command If args[0] is "-noattack" then user choose not to attack and the player moves on to next phase fortification
        Parameters:
        args[0] - from country
        args[1] - to country
        args[2] - number of dice rolls or -allout option

      • handleDefendCommand

        public void handleDefendCommand(String[] args)
        it handles the defend command and executes the entire attack and calls the dice roll method.
        Parameters:
        args[0] - number of dice that defender rolls

      • handleAttackMoveCommand

        public void handleAttackMoveCommand(String[] args)
        it handles the attack move command and moves the army from attacking country to defending country after the attacker has won the defending country.
        Parameters:
        args[0] - number of armies to move from attacking country to defending country

      • isAttackValid

        public boolean isAttackValid()
        it returns whether the attack is valid (true) or not (false)
        Returns:
        boolean it checks whether attack is valid or not and returns true or false based on that.

      • endAttackPhase

        public void endAttackPhase()
        it ends the attack phase and sets the current game phase to fortification

      • setEndOfGamePhase

        public void setEndOfGamePhase()
        it sets the game phase to end of game when a player has won the game

      • exchangeCard

        public void exchangeCard(String[] args)
        handle exchange card command
        Parameters:
        args - 3 number as position of card in a set, -none at the end to not exchange
